page.title: 06GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: In the infants we play tiggy & sing nursery rhymes but in the juniors we have piggy back fights and play bulldog, but it's banned now as it's dangerous. To play streethawk you need a bike. The goodie goes on the bike and tries to catch the baddie who runs with a 100 second start. Mafia is a game played where one team makes up a code word and the other team has to catch them and 'torture' the code word out of them. Another game is fireball. Everyone stands in a circle and throws a ball round. If someone drops it she runs round the circle while the others throw the ball around. If it gets back to her place before she does she's out. In french skipping you sing a special song while you jump. You also sing songs while playing two-ball.
